control_attributes.control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service take [Assignment: organization-defined actions] to ensure that the required access authorizations and screening criteria are satisfied.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system isolates security functions enforcing access and information flow control from nonsecurity functions and from other security functions.

Control Statement: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service take [Assignment: organization-defined actions] to ensure that the required access authorizations and screening criteria are satisfied.
